entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
